title: Sora 2 System Card
description: Sora 2 is our new state of the art video and audio generation model. title: Launching Sora responsibly
description: To address the novel safety challenges posed by a state-of-the-art video model as well as a new social creation platform, we’ve built Sora 2 and the Sora app with safety at the foundation. Our approach is anchored in concrete protections.

title: Meta AI’s app downloads and daily users spiked after launch of ‘Vibes’ AI video feed

title: FTC removes Lina Khan-era posts about AI risks and open source

title: OpenEvidence, the ChatGPT for doctors, raises $200M at $6B valuation

title: Senate Republicans deepfaked Chuck Schumer, and X hasn’t taken it down
description: The video was posted Friday on the Senate Republicans' X account. title: Self-improving language models are becoming reality with MIT's updated SEAL technique

title: These nonprofits lobbied to regulate OpenAI — then the subpoenas came
description: On August 19th at 7:07PM, Tyler Johnston received a message from his roommate. A man, the text said, was knocking on their door with legal documents to serve. Johnston is the founder of The Midas Project: a nonprofit that monitors the practices of "leading AI companies to ensure transparency, privacy, and ethical standards are maintained." […]

title: Opera’s Neon shows just how confusing AI browsers still are
description: The trick to understanding Opera's Neon browser is recognizing that it's not just a browser with an AI bot added to it, but a browser with three AI bots all living side by side. This is both a strength and a weakness, because while you don't have to leave to do all the AI things […]

title: Facebook’s new button lets its AI look at photos you haven’t uploaded yet
description: Meta has rolled out an opt-in AI feature to its US and Canadian Facebook users that claims to make their photos and videos more “shareworthy.” The only catch is that the feature is designed for your phone’s camera roll — not the media you’ve already uploaded to Facebook. If you opt in, Meta’s AI will […]

title: OpenAI suspends MLK deepfakes on Sora after ‘disrespectful’ videos
description: OpenAI said on Thursday night that it has “paused” deepfakes of Martin Luther King Jr. on its social app Sora after users created “disrespectful” AI-generated videos of the late civil rights leader. It said representatives or estates of other historical figures will now be able to opt out of their likeness being used on the […]

title: AI can’t even turn on the lights
description: Large language models are currently everyone's solution to everything. The technology's versatility is part of its appeal: the use cases for generative AI seem both huge and endless. But then you use the stuff, and not enough of it works very well. And you wonder what we're really accomplishing here. On this episode of The […]
